message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it's a fantastic deal and would be very valuable to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is my bottom line. I can't go any lower than that.
